MasterCook 3.0 Deluxe

By DigitaLink on Thursday, December 27, 2001 - 02:44 pm:

Could anyone who used this subcode (or Lisa who posted it) tell me what the starting stats of this Zilla were? I'm experimenting with Quincunx's PSec modifications and I'm curious to see if it's working or not and what kind of gains/losses I'm getting out of it.

I decided to give PSec 54 to increase power, skill, and speed, since according to DP the Zilla's stat gains are 4-5-2-1-2-4 and starting higher in skill and speed could be a perk ... and the life and defence lost would be more easily gained back in training. Thanks for any help ... this board ROCKS!

By DigitaLink on Friday, December 28, 2001 - 09:56 am:

As a tag to my last message, I went ahead with my little experiment there, and using the base stats of my first gen Zilla (combining with the beard) the PSec 54 modification gave a 75 point combined increase! Still not the most outstanding of starts for a monster (still under 700 combined starting stats) but 75 points is 75 points! If anyone wants my modified code, let me know.
